name: RWBY Moonlit Crisis
description:
RWBY Moonlit Crisis is currently in development.

The current functions are:

PVP(90 sec time or unlimited), controller support and 1 playable fighter.

Future functions will be:

More characters, AI and online.

Controls:

P1: WASD for movement and TYUI for attacking. (I is the confirm button in the menu and character select)

P2: arrow keys for movement and Numlock 123Enter for attacking. (Numlock enter is the confirm button in character select)

Xbox controller: Dpad for movement and XYBA for attacking. (A is the confirm button)

Please leave feedback to keep the development going!
